    • Constructor Detail

      • MySqlFactory

        public MySqlFactory()
        Overwrite some default SqlFactory values to use more appropriate MySql defaults. More defaults can be set using applyStableConnectionProps(Properties).
        Note that autocommit is default set to false.

    • Method Detail

      • applyStableConnectionProps

        public static void applyStableConnectionProps(Properties connectionProps)
        Sets a collection of MySQL connection properties that help performance and stability (if a property is already set, the value is not overwritten).
        Note that the properties set a maximum of 5 minutes that a query can run, if this is no good, update the property socketTimeout to an appropriate value (time in milliseconds).
        Parameters:
        connectionProps - the properties for SqlFactory.getConnectionProps().
